snippet: Not renewing the farm bill is a legislative lapse of shameful proportions.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Congress for failing to renew the farm bill; warns that dairy farmers in particular will be greatly harmed; urges Congress to make sure dairy subsidies are restored as soon as members return from recess.
lead_paragraph: Not renewing the farm bill is a legislative lapse of shameful proportions.

headline.seo: A Gloomy Season for Dairy Farmers
headline.main: A Gloomy Season for Dairy Farmers
headline.print_headline: A Gloomy Season for Dairy Farmers
